ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
Invoked like `poet foo` for some package foo **which is presently installed
in sys.path**, determines which packages foo and its dependents depend on,
downloads them from pypi and computes their checksums, and spits out
Homebrew resource stanzas.
about.summary: Generates Homebrew resource stanzas for Python packages

about.description:
Invoked like `poet foo` for some package foo **which is presently installed
in sys.path**, determines which packages foo and its dependents depend on,
downloads them from pypi and computes their checksums, and spits out
Homebrew resource stanzas.
about.summary: Generates Homebrew resource stanzas for Python packages

name: homebrew-pypi-poet
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "homebrew-pypi-poet" %}
{% set version = "0.10.0" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e09e997e35a98f66445f9a39ccb33d6d93c5cd090302a59f231707eac0bf378e

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - poet=poet:main
    - poet_lint=poet.lint:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - jinja2
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - poet
  commands:
    - pip check
    - poet --help
    - poet_lint --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/tdsmith/homebrew-pypi-poet
  summary: Generates Homebrew resource stanzas for Python packages
  description: |
    Invoked like `poet foo` for some package foo **which is presently installed
    in sys.path**, determines which packages foo and its dependents depend on,
    downloads them from pypi and computes their checksums, and spits out
    Homebrew resource stanzas.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/tdsmith/homebrew-pypi-poet

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - BastianZim
